long_description: With its wide brim and light weight, the kids' Sunday Afternoons Scout Hat offers plenty of UV protection and cooling ventilation. UPF 50+ sun protection (mesh ventilation panels in the crown are not UPF rated). Floating foam-core brim features a brim wire for easy shaping; dark panel under the brim reduces glare. The Sunday Afternoons Scout Hat features a moisture-wicking sweatband and cooling mesh liner. SmartStrap(R) breakaway chin strap eliminates choking hazard.
short_description: With its wide brim and light weight, the kids' Sunday Afternoons Scout Hat offers plenty of UV protection and cooling ventilation.
